name: This Moon is Mine - LD38
description:
Warning: It's a 2 players game, however, there is a little basic solo mode but it's only for people who don't have any opponnent to play with. If you can play the Versus mode, please don't play the Solo, it is not very interesting

This moon is yours! But your long-time opponent does not take the same view! Fight for this small world!

This Moon is Mine is a Versus Fighting game for 2 players.

Ludum Dare link : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/this-moon-is-mine
